AD_FIELD.NAME: Organization
AD_FIELD.HELP: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Active
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A flag indicating whether this record is available for use or de-activated.
AD_FIELD.HELP: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reporting. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for auditing purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are existing invoices for it. By de-activating the Business Partner you prevent it from being used in future transactions.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Quantity
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of items required to consider the family as complete
AD_FIELD.HELP: Number of items required to consider the family as complete, in case the family is composed by different products, this quantity is satisfied when it is reached by summing the number of items of any of the involved products.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Allow Increase Line Price
AD_FIELD.HELP: Allow Increase Line Price

AD_FIELD.NAME: Fixed Price
AD_FIELD.HELP: Price (in Price List's currency) that will be applied to each of the units of each product in the family when the combo is applied.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Active
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A flag indicating whether this record is available for use or de-activated.
AD_FIELD.HELP: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reporting. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for auditing purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are existing invoices for it. By de-activating the Business Partner you prevent it from being used in future transactions.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Organization
AD_FIELD.HELP: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Client
AD_FIELD.HELP: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Translation
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An indication that an item is translated.
AD_FIELD.HELP: The Translated checkbox indicates if this column is translated.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Language
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A method of communication being used.
AD_FIELD.HELP: The Language identifies the language to use for display

AD_FIELD.NAME: Organization
AD_FIELD.HELP: An organization is a unit of your client or legal entity - examples are store, department. You can share data between organizations.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Product
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An item produced by a process.
AD_FIELD.HELP: Identifies an item which is either purchased or sold in this organization.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Percentage
AD_FIELD.HELP: Percentage that will be discounted from each of the units of each product in the family when the combo is applied.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Name
AD_FIELD.HELP: Family Name. It is used in WebPOS Combo selector to identify the family.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Promotion/Discount
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The ability to raise or lower prices.
AD_FIELD.HELP: Promotion or Discount applied to a particular line (product) automatically by the system.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Fixed Discount
AD_FIELD.HELP: Fixed amount (in Price List's currency) that will be discounted from each of the units of each product in the family when the combo is applied.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Client
AD_FIELD.HELP: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Name
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A non-unique identifier for a record/document often used as a search tool.
AD_FIELD.HELP: A more descriptive identifier (that does need to be unique) of a record/document that is used as a default search option along with the search key (that is unique and mostly shorter). It is up to 60 characters in length.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Active
AD_FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A flag indicating whether this record is available for use or de-activated.
AD_FIELD.HELP: There are two methods of making records unavailable in the system: One is to delete the record, the other is to de-activate the record. A de-activated record is not available for selection, but available for reporting. There are two reasons for de-activating and not deleting records: (1) The system requires the record for auditing purposes. (2) The record is referenced by other records. E.g., you cannot delete a Business Partner, if there are existing invoices for it. By de-activating the Business Partner you prevent it from being used in future transactions.

AD_FIELD.NAME: Client
AD_FIELD.HELP: A Client is a company or a legal entity. You cannot share data between Clients.
